name: Human: become human
description:
Core Play

The Third-person Racing Game & The Box Climbing Game

We needs to face our heart: what makes us human?

Behide the Game

“Takeaway Riders, Trapped in the System”, is an article in 2020 that discusses the conflict between takeaway riders and algorithms. The riders meet, interact and clash with the algorithms, which attracts much attention of the public in 2020. While one year passes, the discussion subsides and there is no further reflection. I think this article matters a lot because it discusses not only riders’ failure to resist the algorithmic invasion of their life, but also the alienation of workers who are surveilled in the “Digital Panopticon ” in the context of technological progress. In my opinion, it involves every one of us.

In the context of the technology’s full-scale invasion into our daily life, I hope to discuss those topic via game: what on earth should the algorithm be in the digital age? And, what makes a human a human?
